scripts.postinstall: cd apps/backend && node scripts/fetchDictionary.js && npx next telemetry disable
scripts.disable-telemetry: npx turbo telemetry disable && npx next telemetry disable
scripts.setup-env: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const be=path.join('apps','backend','.env.example');const fe=path.join('apps','frontend','.env.example');const beTarget=path.join('apps','backend','.env');const feTarget=path.join('apps','frontend','.env');if(fs.existsSync(be) && !fs.existsSync(beTarget))fs.copyFileSync(be,beTarget);if(fs.existsSync(fe) && !fs.existsSync(feTarget))fs.copyFileSync(fe,feTarget);console.log('Environment files created from examples');"
